snippet: A National Guard member packing for deployment to Afghanistan paused for Ash Wednesday services at St. Francis de Sales in New York City, not yet knowing that moments of surprising grace lay before him.
abstract: A National Guard member packing for deployment to Afghanistan paused for Ash Wednesday services at St. Francis de Sales in New York City, not yet knowing that moments of surprising grace lay before him.

headline.main: Receiving Ashes Before Confronting Afghanistan's Dust
